column2: "...What's wrong, big sis?"
"G-give me a minute, Aru. I'm not ready yet... In and out... In, and... out... Alright."
"Xiera and <%me>-- Uh, there's more? I've never seen them before, but they look important!"
"What's with the... serious looks? Is it us? A-am I going to be interrogated like a prisoner of war?"
"Big sis, what's a prisoner of war?"
"Don't worry about it, Aru, just leave it to me. I didn't come all the way here to humiliate myself... I'm all prepared for this."
"Aaah! I have no idea what's going on! They probably won't do anything to me, will they? They're probably gonna do a body search, aren't they?"
"Ooh, it won't be embarrassing will it? They can't possibly do that here! Whoa, whoa, whoa!"
"Should I take what they say at face value or with a grain of salt? I mean, they did save me, but that doesn't mean they can do whatever they want!"
"Uh, hello? ARKS to Hitsugi? Imagine what you will, but we're not going to do anything to you."
"Eh?"
"Actually, you're an important guest to us. We would never treat you like a prisoner of war!"

"So, you're Hitsugi Yasaka. I take it you're the Earthling who's
cooperating with ARKS. I see...you're just like Itsuki and Rina."

"U-uh...
and you are?"
"I'm Aika. An ARKS operative working in the Information Sector. I was recently performing investigations on Earth."
"...Eh? On Earth?"
"Correct. I briefly attended a school while there, and have become familiar with some of the denizen's common knowledge."
"Casra, do you have anything to say for your Unit keeping quiet about these operations for so long?"
"Come now, Xiera! You make me sound so cold... We came to cooperate and share what information we do have on the matter."

"The matter in question is, of course, involving the fact
that this young lady has been invited aboard."
"M-Me?"
"Our commander is far too lenient. She would gladly retrieve a broken trinket that was better off discarded, and save something that doesn't need saving."
"That being said, it is certainly not a bad trait--indeed, it's one of her best. At this point, I would not even attempt to change her ways."
"Big sis, what does that mean?"
"Rest assured, Aru, that I am just as clueless as you are."
"So you kept quiet because Commander Ulc would have leapt into action to help a situation that didn't necessarily require our aid, right?"
"Xiao's successor was trained well, I see. I appreciate that you understood so quickly."
"To be honest, regardless of whether we'd informed the Commander or not, the result would not likely have changed much."
"The people that live on Earth are not so different from us. I cannot simply ignore them like that."

"As you can see, my investigator came to the same conclusion as my Commander.
Thus, we decided it was best if we simply came clean."
"Besides, if we'd continued to act in secrecy, <%me> would inevitably wind up investigating our suspiciousness, and that would not end well."
"From now on, we shall share our intelligence regarding Earth's environment and geography with you, as well as our allies on Earth."

"Allies? You mean, there's people on Earth who are
aware that ARKS are people from another world?!"
"Of course, young lady! Even on Earth, there are those who know of and understand ARKS, and those who would be useful allies."
"Alas, no official agreement has yet been made, so we cannot share any details. With that said..."
"That's where we stand on the issue of not disclosing intel. I'll send the rest to you, Xiera, so you can review it and brief them further."
"We'll be off then, Aika."
"I'll be taking my leave, then."
"Hey, wait up, you! Come on... Gonna talk like that, then leave me like this? The Intelligence Unit's so selfish!"
"Wai-what?! That's a bigger file than I thought! What's all of this?! How much have they been hiding?! I can't keep up with all of this!"
"Wha-- Don't dump so much incomplete stuff like this! If you're going to keep secrets, at least organize your stuff so you can keep track of it! Geez!"
"Uhh... Xiera?"
"Oh sorry, but could you please give me some time to reorganize all of this?"
"Oh, I know! <%me>, could you pleeease give Hitsugi and Aru a tour around the ARKS ship?"
"I should be done with all of this by the time you guys get back!"
"Commander, if that was all the intel you intended to give them, then I could've done it myself."
"If it were just that, I would've. I simply wanted to greet them myself."
"That said, we're going to be busy. I expect hard work from you, Aika."
"Of course, Commander. Earth is like a second home to me."
